duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide remarkable customer service through routine interactions, problem resolution, telephone answering, etc.
Act as a digital ambassador to transition customers to digital solutions.
Ensure compliance with applicable federal, state and local laws and regulations, and Comerica’s policies and procedures.
Consistently impact the efforts that improve banking center collaboration.

education_certification.credential: 6 months of Retail or financial sales experience OR 2 years of U.S. Military service OR 1 year of college
